text: Ismat Ara Sadique (12 December 1942 â€“ 21 January 2020) was a Bangladeshi politician. She was the Minister of Ministry of Public Administration from 2014 to 2018. She was a member of Jatiya Sangsad from 2014 until 2020. She was a member of the Awami League. Sadique died on 21 January 2020 in Dhaka at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Rajshahi Division
title: Ismat Ara Sadique
